text: Here Comes the Boom is a 2012 American comedy film directed by Frank Coraci, co-written, produced by and starring Kevin James. It was also written by Allan Loeb and Rock Reuben with music by Rupert Gregson-Williams. The film co-stars Henry Winkler and Salma Hayek. It was produced  by Happy Madison Productions. The film was released in the United States on October 12, 2012 by Columbia Pictures.  The film's title is taken from the song "Boom" by Christian rock band P.O.D.
